mapper.sql: id, name, category, pid, priority, type, status, templateId, channelId, tags, isDel, shortName, description, createTime, updateTime
mapper.update: update t_subject set name=#{name}, channelId=#{channelId}, description=#{description}, status=#{status}, pid=#{pid}, tags=#{tags}, type=#{type}, priority=#{priority}, shortName=#{shortName}, updateTime=now() where id=#{id}
update t_subject set isDel=1 where id =#{id}
mapper.select:
select
from t_subject where isDel=0 and (#{0}='' or name like "%"#{0}"%") order by if(updateTime is null,createTime,updateTime) desc limit #{1},#{2};
